meanings.definition: The act of comparing two or more things.
meanings.sent1: I made some comparisons between different cars before buying one.
meanings.sent2: Her comparisons of the two paintings helped her decide which one to buy.
meanings.sent3: Sarah's comparisons of her cat to a lion always make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The chef's comparisons of flavors in the dish were like a symphony of tastes.
meanings.sent5: His comparisons of the stars to diamonds made stargazing even more magical.

meanings.sent1: The comparisons between the two products were interesting to analyze.
meanings.sent2: The student felt nervous about being in constant comparisons with her classmates.
meanings.sent3: The cat's comparisons to a king in his little castle always amused the family.
meanings.sent4: The city's comparisons to a living organism were quite thought-provoking.
meanings.sent5: The comparisons between the siblings' personalities were stark and undeniable.

meanings.definition: An examination of similarities and differences between two or more things.
meanings.sent1: The comparisons between the two poems revealed their unique styles.
meanings.sent2: His comparisons of the two job offers helped him make a decision.
meanings.sent3: The cake's comparisons to a fluffy cloud made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The artist's comparisons of colors were like a beautiful dance on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The comparisons between the old and new buildings were striking.
